Question: Kubera iki mumaze igihe kinini mutaduha uburenganzira bwo gufungura Irembo ryacu? Ndashaka nanjye kujya mfasha abantu kubona serivisi z'Irembo
Answer: Irembo ntabwo yemeye gufungura Irembo kubera umutekano nimpamvu zikorwa. Ariko, urashobora gufasha abantu kubona serivise za Gateway mugutezimbere no gusangira amakuru kubyerekeye serivisi ziboneka binyuze mumiyoboro yemewe.

Question: Ese umuntu ashaka akazi mu Irembo yabavugisha gute?
Answer: Kubaza amahirwe yakazi muri Iregate, abantu barashobora gusura urubuga rwa Iregate cyangwa bakabaza ishami ryabo rishinzwe abakozi binyuze kuri imeri cyangwa terefone kugirango bagaragaze ko bashimishijwe kandi babaze imyanya ihari.

Question: Icyangombwa cyanjye cy'ubutaka narakibuze kandi ngejeje igihe cyo gutanga umusoro
Answer: Niba waratakaje ubutaka bwawe mu Rwanda, uzakenera gusaba titre ebyiri kubiro bishinzwe iyandikisha ry'ubutaka. Umaze kugira titre duplicate, urashobora gukomeza kwishyura imisoro yubutaka nkuko leta ibisabwa.

Question: Ese ko mbona gusaba pasiporo bitari gukunda mwamfasha kuyinsabira
Answer: Nibyo, ndashobora kugufasha gusaba pasiporo binyuze muri serivisi za Irembo mu Rwanda. Nyamuneka mpa amakuru akenewe hamwe ninyandiko, kandi nzakuyobora muburyo bwo gusaba.

Question: Ese Irembo
Answer: Oya, Irembo ntabwo ari irembo. Irembo ni urubuga rwa interineti mu Rwanda rutanga serivisi za leta kubaturage nubucuruzi.

Question: Aka message mwampaye narakabuze kandi ejo mfite examen. nakabona gute?
Answer: Urashobora kubona ubutumwa winjiye muri konte yawe ya Irembo ukareba amateka yubutumwa bwawe. Niba udashoboye kuyimenya, urashobora kwegera abakiriya ba Irembo kugirango bagufashe mugutanga ubutumwa mbere yikizamini cyawe ejo.

Question: Icyumweru gishize niyandikishije ku kizami ariko sinibuka italiki y'ikizamini. Munyibutse italiki
Answer: Kugirango ugarure itariki yawe y'ibizamini, urashobora kwinjira kuri konte yawe ya Irembo hanyuma ukareba gahunda uzaza cyangwa ukabaza akanama gashinzwe ibizamini kugirango ubafashe.

Question: Nijoro niyandikishije ariko ndi kwishyura bikanga. Kandi ndabishaka cyane mumfashe
Answer: Niba wiyandikishije mwijoro ryakeye kandi ukaba ugifite ibibazo byo kwishyura, nyamuneka wegera abakiriya ba Irembo kugirango bagufashe. Bazashobora kugufasha gukemura ibibazo byose bijyanye no kwishura no kwemeza inzira nziza kuri wewe.

Question: Nasabye icyemezo gisimbura indangamuntu ariko ntabwo nibuka numero yanjye ya dosiye. Mwanyibutsa?
Answer: Kubwamahirwe, nkumufasha, ntabwo nshobora kubona amakuru yihariye nka numero ya dosiye yawe. Ndasaba kuvugana ninzego zibishinzwe cyangwa itsinda rya serivisi ryabakiriya ba Irembo kugirango bagufashe kugarura numero yawe ya dosiye kugirango usabe indangamuntu.

Question: Ndikugerageza kudownloadinga icyemezo cyanjye cy'amavuko nk'ibisanzwe ariko ntibikunda sinzi ikibazo kirimo
Answer: Niba uhuye nibibazo byo gukuramo icyemezo cyamavuko kuri Irembo, nyamuneka urebe ko ufite umurongo wa interineti uhamye kandi ugerageze kuvugurura page cyangwa gukuraho cache ya mushakisha yawe. Niba ikibazo gikomeje, urashobora guhamagara abakiriya ba Irembo kugirango bagufashe.

Question: Maze kwiyandikisha ariko nsanze nashyizemo kuzakorera Rusizi kandi nashakaga Musanze. Munkuriremo iyo dosiye nongere niyandikishe
Answer: Kugira ngo ukosore amakosa mu kwiyandikisha kwawe, nyamuneka hamagara abakiriya ba Irembo kugirango bakureho dosiye itari yo. Iyo dosiye imaze gukurwaho, urashobora gukomeza kwiyandikisha hamwe nuburyo bukwiye bwa Musanze.

Question: Ese birashoboka ko mwampindurira uwo twari kuzashakana nkashyiraho undi. Nandikishije ishyingirwa ariko uwo twari kuzashakana yarabyanze nshaka undi
Answer: Ubukwe bumaze kwandikwa mu Rwanda, ntibishoboka guhindura umukunzi wawe ugashyiraho undi. Niba umukunzi wawe yanze kwandikisha abashakanye, ushobora gukenera kugisha inama amategeko muburyo bwo gukomeza.

Question: Ndashaka kwishyura imisoro hakiri kare bataramfungira.
Answer: Urashobora kuriha imisoro kumurongo ukoresheje urubuga rwu Rwanda Revenue Authority (RRA) ukoresheje urubuga rwa Irembo. Sura gusa urubuga rwa RRA, hitamo uburyo bwo kwishyura imisoro, hanyuma ukurikize amabwiriza yo kwishyura imisoro hakiri kare kandi wirinde ibihano byose.

Question: Nabonye ku mbuga zanyu mwatumenyesheje ko mushobora kudufasha gusimbuza amafoto yo ku ndangamuntu
Answer: Nibyo, Irembo itanga serivise ifasha abantu gusimbuza amafoto kurirangamuntu yabo mu Rwanda. Urashobora gukoresha urubuga rwa Irembo kugirango utangire inzira kandi ukurikize intambwe zikenewe zo kuvugurura ifoto yindangamuntu.

Question: Mu kwiyandikisha kuri permit
Answer: Mugihe wiyandikishije kugirango ubone uruhushya binyuze muri serivisi za Irembo mu Rwanda, urashobora gusaba byoroshye no gucunga ibyemezo bya leta bitandukanye kumurongo, bikagutwara igihe n'imbaraga.

Question: Maze kwishyura Traffic fine ariko nsanga n'umushoferi wanjye nawe yishyuye
Answer: Niba wishyuye amande yimodoka ariko umushoferi wawe nawe yarayishyuye, ugomba guhamagara inzego zibishinzwe kugirango ubamenyeshe ubwishyu bubiri. Tanga icyemezo cyuko wishyuye kandi usabe gusubizwa ubwishyu bubiri bwakozwe numushoferi wawe.

Question: ko ubushize nasabye icyemezo cy'uko ntafunzwe nkahita nkibona
Answer: Irembo itanga serivisi yo gusaba icyemezo cyinshinjabyaha, ushobora kuboneka vuba kandi byoroshye kumurongo. Urashobora gutanga icyifuzo cyawe ukoresheje Irembo hanyuma ukakira icyemezo vuba.

Question: Twasabye ibyemezo by'uko tutafunzwe njye na madamu n'umuhungu wanjye ariko bo barabibonye njye sinzi impamvu byatinze
Answer: Ndasaba kwegera ubuyobozi butanga kugirango mubaze ibijyanye no gutinda kubona ibyemezo bivuga ko wowe, umugore wawe, numuhungu wawe utafunzwe. Bashobora gutanga ibisobanuro kubibazo kandi bagafasha gukemura ibibazo byose.

Question: Nifuzaga kumenya aho icyangombwa cyanjye cy'ubutaka kigeze kuko twakoze mutation ukwezi gushize kandi sindabona icyangombwa cyanjye
Answer: Kugirango umenye uko icyemezo cyubutaka bwawe gihagaze nyuma ya mutation, urashobora gusura ibiro byubuyobozi bushinzwe imicungire yubutaka nâ€™imikoreshereze (RLMUA) aho mutation yatunganyirijwe. Bazashobora kuguha amakuru agezweho kubijyanye no gutanga ibyemezo byawe.

Question: Mvuye mu kizamini ariko nahise nzimya machine ntabonye amanota yanjye
Answer: Niba wavuye mu kizamini utarebye amanota yawe, urashobora guhamagara umuyobozi w'ikigo cyangwa ikigo kugirango usabe amanota yawe. Bashobora kuguha amakuru ukeneye.

Question: Kubera iki umuntu akenera icyemezo cy'uko ari ho kandi mumubona ko ari muzima?
Answer: Icyemezo kibaho, nk'icyemezo cy'amavuko cyangwa inyandiko iranga, akenshi bisabwa mubikorwa bitandukanye, harimo kubona serivisi za leta, gufungura konti muri banki, no gusaba ibyangombwa. Ifasha kumenya umwirondoro wumuntu no kwemererwa uburenganzira ninyungu runaka.

Question: Bitewe n'uko mbona serivisi z'Irembo ari ingenzi cyane kandi hano mu gace kacu nta bantu dufite badufasha kuzibona
Answer: Serivisi za Irembo zitanga urubuga rworoshye rwo kugera kuri serivisi zitandukanye za leta kumurongo mu Rwanda. Urashobora kubona byoroshye no gukoresha izi serivisi ukoresheje urubuga rwa Irembo cyangwa porogaramu igendanwa, byorohereza abantu bo mu turere twa kure kubona serivisi zingenzi badakeneye ubufasha bwumubiri.

Question: Nk'uko mudushikariza kwisabira serivisi ku Irembo
Answer: Nkuko tubashishikarije gusaba serivisi kumarembo, nyamuneka menye neza ko ufite ibyangombwa byose nibisobanuro byateguwe mbere kugirango byihute. Byongeye kandi, wumve neza ko wegera itsinda ryacu ryunganira abakiriya niba uhuye nikibazo cyangwa ufite ikibazo mugihe cyo gusaba.

Question: Kubera iki umuntu asaba icyemezo cy'uko ari ingaragu bakamusaba kuzana icyemezo kerekana ko ari ingaragu akuye mu mudugudu?
Answer: Iyo umuntu asabye icyemezo cy'ubuseribateri mu Rwanda, asabwa kuzana icyemezo mu mudugudu wabo kugira ngo agenzure uko abashakanye bahagaze. Iyi nyandiko yinyongera ifasha kwemeza ukuri nukuri kwamakuru yatanzwe mugikorwa cyo gusaba.

Question: Ubusanzwe pasiporo itwara igihe kingana gute ko mbona iyanjye yatinze?
Answer: Igihe cyo gutunganya pasiporo mu Rwanda ni iminsi 10 y'akazi. Niba pasiporo yawe ifata igihe kirenze ibi, urashobora kugenzura ninzego zibishinzwe kugirango ubaze uko ibyifuzo byawe bihagaze.

Question: Numvise ko ku Irembo mushobora kumfasha kubona diplome ifite agaciro ko mu Rwanda kuko njye nize muri Israel. Bigenda gute?
Answer: Nibyo, kuri Irembo urashobora gusaba kuringaniza dipolome yawe yamahanga kugirango yemeze mu Rwanda. Uzakenera gutanga ibyangombwa bikenewe hanyuma ukurikize inzira yo gusaba kugirango ubone uburinganire.

Question: Muraho! Ni gute umuntu yabona icyemezo cy'ubushinjacyaha mu gihe agikeneye?
Answer: Kugira ngo umuntu abone icyemezo cy'umushinjacyaha mu Rwanda, umuntu ku giti cye ashobora gusura ibiro by'ubushinjacyaha bikwegereye cyangwa akabaza ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe ubushinjacyaha (NPPA) kugira ngo akuyobore ku bisabwa byihariye n'uburyo agomba gukurikiza. Ni ngombwa gutanga ibyangombwa byose bikenewe hamwe namakuru kugirango ashyigikire icyifuzo cyumushinjacyaha.

Question: Nagiye gusaba akazi muri RBA bansaba icyemezo cy'amavuko kandi njyewe nsanze acte de naissance
Answer: Niba warabonye icyemezo cyamavuko, urashobora gukoresha serivise ya Irembo kugirango ubone icyemezo cyangwa usabe izindi kopi mugihe bikenewe kugirango usabe akazi muri RBA.

Question: Mfite uruhushya rwo gutwara imodoka
Answer: Niba ufite uruhushya rwo gutwara ibinyabiziga mu Rwanda, urashobora gukoresha serivisi ya Irembo kugirango uyivugurure kumurongo utiriwe usura ibiro byabiherewe uburenganzira. Sura gusa urubuga rwa Irembo cyangwa porogaramu igendanwa kugirango utangire inzira yo kuvugurura kandi ukurikize amabwiriza yatanzwe.

Question: Mfite ikibanza kinini naguze hariya Rusororo. Ariko ndashaka kukigabanyamo kabiri hamwe nkazaturamo ahandi nkazubakamo amazu akodeshwa. Bambwiye ko mbisabira ku Irembo
Answer: Urashobora gusaba serivisi zo kugabana ubutaka ukoresheje urubuga rwa interineti rwa Irembo. Kora konti gusa, wuzuze impapuro zikenewe, hanyuma utange ibyifuzo byawe kugirango ubyemeze. Iyi nzira izagufasha kugabana byemewe nubutaka bwawe muri Rusororo kubyo ugamije.

Question: Ndangije kwiga secondaire
Answer: Twishimiye kurangiza amashuri yisumbuye! Niba ushaka guteza imbere amashuri yawe, urashobora gukoresha serivisi za Irembo kugirango usabe kwinjira muri kaminuza cyangwa ugere kubindi bikoresho byuburezi mu Rwanda.

Question: Ku kazi badusabye icyemezo cy'uko tutafunzwe. Natanze icyemezo gisanzwe nakuye muri parike umwaka ushize baracyanga. Mwamenyera neza iki cyemezo kimara igihe kingana gute mu by'ukuri ndetse n'uko nabigenza ngo mbone icyemezo gishya?
Answer: Mu Rwanda, icyemezo cy'inshinjabyaha cyakuwe mu biro by'ubushinjacyaha gifite agaciro mu gihe cy'amezi atandatu. Kugira ngo ubone icyemezo gishya, urashobora gusaba imwe ukoresheje serivisi za Irembo kumurongo cyangwa gusura ubushinjacyaha imbonankubone kugirango inyandiko ivuguruye.

Question: Ejo banyibye ibyangombwa byanjye birimo perimi n'indangamuntu. Ubu koko naca mu zihe nzira ngo mbone ibindi byangombwa?
Answer: Mbabajwe no kumva ubujura bwinyandiko zawe. Kugirango ubone abasimbuza uruhushya rwo gutwara no kwerekana indangamuntu, ugomba kumenyesha abapolisi ubujura hanyuma ugasura inzego zibishinzwe nka polisi ishinzwe umutekano wo mu muhanda uruhushya rwo gutwara ibinyabiziga ndetse nâ€™ikigo cyâ€™igihugu gishinzwe kumenyekanisha indangamuntu kugirango usabe abasimbuye.
